name: @commercelayer/cypress-vcr
description: Record your test suite's HTTP interactions and replay them during future test runs for fast

scripts.publish:patch: npm run prepare && npm run version:patch && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:minor: npm run prepare && npm run version:minor && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:major: npm run prepare && npm run version:major && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access public

author: Alessandro Casazza
